tool_description: FakeShopAPI is a  online REST API that provides pseudo-real data for your e-commerce or shopping website projects. It's perfect for coding samples, tests, and educational purposes.
name: Fake Shop API
title: Fake Shop API

api_list.name: GET One Product
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fake-shop-api.p.rapidapi.com/products/64d7e741e03347cdf0b5611f"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fake-shop-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
